works.projectDescription: Teamed up with a team to transform a non-invasive blood sugar monitoring device into a smart app. The SugarCheck app supports individual accounts for patients and caregivers, displaying real-time measurement results from the device. It leverages Supabase for data storage, includes a Machine Learning model for predicting diabetes, tracks patient medications, and features a chatbot with daily health tips powered by Gemini API.

experience.title: Freelance Flutter Developer
detailes: Implemented real-time data visualization using custom widgets.
Used APIs and Supabase for backend services.
Delivered clean, maintainable, and scalable code.
